home.name: David Castrillón Gonzales
home.main_paragraph: Web developer focused on FrontEnd using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React. I'm a crack at building web applications for leading companies in the sector.
home.second_paragraph: Additionally +2 years of experience in GO, NodeJS and JAVA and +3 years of experience in test automation using Selenium and Appium

about.title: About me
about.first_paragraph: I am passionate about programming and constantly learning about new technologies. I firmly believe that knowledge is for everyone, and I enjoy collaborative learning and applying what I've learned in the workplace through teaching.
about.second_paragraph: I am someone who enjoys working in a team, loves challenges, and is known for remaining calm when making decisions to help find solutions to problems in a work environment.
about.third_paragraph: Committed to using my experience and knowledge in software quality to improve applications and generate more value for customers.
